hooks.name: file-guard
hooks.description: Prevents accidental modification of critical system files and directories

hooks.name: keyword-detector
hooks.description: Detects important keywords in user prompts and flags them for special handling

hooks.name: cost-tracker
hooks.description: Tracks API usage costs and warns when approaching budget limits

hooks.name: codebase-map
hooks.description: Generates or updates codebase map for context awareness at session start

hooks.name: typecheck-changed
hooks.description: Runs TypeScript type checking after Write/Edit on .ts/.tsx files

hooks.name: lint-changed
hooks.description: Runs ESLint after Write/Edit on .js/.ts/.tsx/.jsx files

hooks.name: checkpoint
hooks.description: Creates git stash checkpoint before session ends if uncommitted changes exist

hooks.name: thinking-level
hooks.description: Detects complex tasks and adds reasoning enhancement instructions
